metadata.Title: CVE-2017-13134 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
In ImageMagick 7.0.6-6 and GraphicsMagick 1.3.26, a heap-based buffer over-read was found in the function SFWScan in coders/sfw.c, which allows attackers to cause a denial of service via a crafted file. It was discovered that GraphicsMagick incorrectly handled certain image files. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service or other unspecified impact.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-13134` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

graphicsmagick - 1.3.26-19
graphicsmagick-imagemagick-compat - 1.3.26-19
libgraphics-magick-perl - 1.3.26-19
libgraphicsmagick++-q16-12 - 1.3.26-19
libgraphicsmagick-q16-3 - 1.3.26-19
No subscription required

imagemagick - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu8
imagemagick-6-common - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu8
imagemagick-6.q16 - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu8
imagemagick-6.q16hdri - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu8
imagemagick-common - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu8
libimage-magick-perl - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu8
libimage-magick-q16-perl - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu8
libimage-magick-q16hdri-perl - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu8
libmagick++-6-headers - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu8
libmagick++-6.q16-8 - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu8
libmagick++-6.q16hdri-8 - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu8
libmagickcore-6-arch-config - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu8
libmagickcore-6-headers - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu8
libmagickcore-6.q16-6 - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu8
libmagickcore-6.q16-6-extra - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu8
libmagickcore-6.q16hdri-6 - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu8
libmagickcore-6.q16hdri-6-extra - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu8
libmagickwand-6-headers - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu8
libmagickwand-6.q16-6 - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu8

perlmagick - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu8
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> 0292-CVE-2017-13134-Fix-heap-based-buffer-overflow-in-SFWScan.patch in wheezy 0249-CVE-2017-13134.patch in jessie 0100-CVE-2017-13134.patch in stretch

criterions.comment: graphicsmagick package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.3.26-19').
imagemagick package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu8').
